snippet: The city says a ruling by the federal government marks a major milestone in its effort to redevelop a large swath of property in Queens near Citi Field.
abstract: The city says a ruling by the federal government marks a major milestone in its effort to redevelop a large swath of property in Queens near Citi Field.

headline.main: Willets Point Development Makes Gain With Highway Administration's Approval
headline.print_headline: Mayor’s Plan to Redevelop Area Near Mets’ Stadium Is Given Green Light by U.S. Agency
